server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  Server.Porter
      The Porter listens for new connections and creates a new NetworkPlayer object when a client connects to the server.

    • Field Detail

      • connectedPlayers

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,NetworkPlayer> connectedPlayers
        Maps all players, that are connected or have been connected to the server, to their given (unique) id's.

      • games

        private java.util.ArrayList<HostedGame> games
        Keeps track of all games that are hosted on the server.

      • idCount

        private int idCount
        This variable keeps track of which id is available for a new client/user. Every time a new client connects he is given this id and afterwards the value is incremented by one.

      • porter

        private Server.Porter porter
        Reference to this server's Porter object/thread.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(int port)
        Initialize the server.

    • Method Detail

      • addPlayer

        private void addPlayer(NetworkPlayer player)
        Add a new NetworkPlayer to the currently connected players list.
        Parameters:
        player - the new player.

      • getAvailableOpponent

        private NetworkPlayer getAvailableOpponent(NetworkPlayer requester)
        Find a player that is available for a match. The returned player will not be the same as the player passed as an argument. An available player is picked at random from all connected players.
        Parameters:
        requester - the NetworkPlayer that is looking for an opponent.
        Returns:
        a NetworkPlayer that is available for matchmaking.

      • randperm

        private static int[] randperm(int size)
        Create an array that stores a random permutation of the set [0, size-1].
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the random permutation array.
        Returns:
        the random permutation

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        . The main method for the Server application
        Parameters:
        args - array of command line arguments. See ARGS_MSG for the required arguments

      • hello

        public void hello(NetworkPlayer player,
                  java.lang.String username,
                  boolean isAI,
                  int magicNumber)
        Called when the InputHandler of a NetworkPlayer receives a HELLO command. The player is welcomed with the WELCOME command.
        Parameters:
        player - the NetworkPlayer from which this command originated.
        username - the desired username of the player.
        isAI - true indicates that the user that is registering is a computer player. false indicates a human player.
        magicNumber - the supported capabilities of the client.

      • gameRequested

        public void gameRequested(NetworkPlayer player)
        Called when the InputHandler of a NetworkPlayer receives a REQUEST command. The server will try to find an opponent for that player. If no opponent is available the player will be available to be matched when another client sends the request command.
        Parameters:
        player - the player that made the request

      • chatReceived

        public void chatReceived(NetworkPlayer player,
                         java.lang.String msg)
        Called when the InputHandler of a NetworkPlayer receives a CHAT command. Broadcasts the chat message to every connected client, that is not banned or errored.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to be sent
